# PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style

**Enumeration**

The type that represents the style of the formatted result.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Style
```

## Overview

The style type describes a length of the string representation of the name. The available values are [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponents/FormatStyle/Style-swift.enum/long], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponents/FormatStyle/Style-swift.enum/medium], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponents/FormatStyle/Style-swift.enum/short], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponents/FormatStyle/Style-swift.enum/abbreviated].

## Enumeration Cases

- **PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style.abbreviated**: Specifies an abbreviated person name components style.
- **PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style.long**: Specifies a long person name components style.
- **PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style.medium**: Specifies a medium person name components style.
- **PersonNameComponents.FormatStyle.Style.short**: Specifies a short person name components style.

## Modifying a Format Style

- **style**: Specifies the style of the formatted result.
- **locale**: The locale to use when formatting the person name components.
- **attributed**: The style used to create a locale-aware attributed string representation of an instance of person name components.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
